parameters.name: KafkaClusters
parameters.description: Kafka Clusters to use in setting up sources / targets for replication. (dict) --- Information about Kafka Cluster to be used as source / target for replication. Details of an Amazon MSK Cluster. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Amazon MSK cluster. Details of an Amazon VPC which has network connectivity to the Apache Kafka cluster. SecurityGroupIds (list) --- The security groups to attach to the ENIs for the broker nodes. (string) --- The list of subnets in the client VPC to connect to. (string) ---

nested_params.name: AmazonMskCluster
nested_params.description: Details of an Amazon MSK Cluster.

nested_params.name: MskClusterArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Amazon MSK cluster.

nested_params.name: VpcConfig
nested_params.description: Details of an Amazon VPC which has network connectivity to the Apache Kafka cluster.

nested_params.name: SecurityGroupIds
nested_params.description: The security groups to attach to the ENIs for the broker nodes.

nested_params.name: SubnetIds
nested_params.description: The list of subnets in the client VPC to connect to.

parameters.name: ReplicationInfoList
parameters.description: A list of replication configurations, where each configuration targets a given source cluster to target cluster replication flow. (dict) --- Specifies configuration for replication between a source and target Kafka cluster. Configuration relating to consumer group replication. ConsumerGroupsToExclude (list) --- List of regular expression patterns indicating the consumer groups that should not be replicated. (string) --- List of regular expression patterns indicating the consumer groups to copy. (string) --- DetectAndCopyNewConsumerGroups (boolean) --- Enables synchronization of consumer groups to target cluster. SynchroniseConsumerGroupOffsets (boolean) --- Enables synchronization of consumer group offsets to target cluster. The translated offsets will be written to topic __consumer_offsets. The ARN of the source Kafka cluster. The compression type to use when producing records to target cluster. The ARN of the target Kafka cluster. Configuration relating to topic replication. CopyAccessControlListsForTopics (boolean) --- Whether to periodically configure remote topic ACLs to match their corresponding upstream topics. CopyTopicConfigurations (boolean) --- Whether to periodically configure remote topics to match their corresponding upstream topics. DetectAndCopyNewTopics (boolean) --- Whether to periodically check for new topics and partitions. StartingPosition (dict) --- Configuration for specifying the position in the topics to start replicating from. Type (string) --- The type of replication starting position. TopicNameConfiguration (dict) --- Configuration for specifying replicated topic names should be the same as their corresponding upstream topics or prefixed with source cluster alias. Type (string) --- The type of replicated topic name. TopicsToExclude (list) --- List of regular expression patterns indicating the topics that should not be replicated. (string) --- List of regular expression patterns indicating the topics to copy. (string) ---

nested_params.name: ConsumerGroupReplication
nested_params.description: Configuration relating to consumer group replication.

nested_params.name: ConsumerGroupsToExclude
nested_params.description: List of regular expression patterns indicating the consumer groups that should not be replicated.

nested_params.name: ConsumerGroupsToReplicate
nested_params.description: List of regular expression patterns indicating the consumer groups to copy.

nested_params.name: DetectAndCopyNewConsumerGroups
nested_params.description: Enables synchronization of consumer groups to target cluster.

nested_params.name: SynchroniseConsumerGroupOffsets
nested_params.description: Enables synchronization of consumer group offsets to target cluster. The translated offsets will be written to topic __consumer_offsets.

nested_params.name: SourceKafkaClusterArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the source Kafka cluster.

nested_params.name: TargetCompressionType
nested_params.description: The compression type to use when producing records to target cluster.

nested_params.name: TargetKafkaClusterArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the target Kafka cluster.

nested_params.name: TopicReplication
nested_params.description: Configuration relating to topic replication.

nested_params.name: CopyAccessControlListsForTopics
nested_params.description: Whether to periodically configure remote topic ACLs to match their corresponding upstream topics.

nested_params.name: CopyTopicConfigurations
nested_params.description: Whether to periodically configure remote topics to match their corresponding upstream topics.

nested_params.name: DetectAndCopyNewTopics
nested_params.description: Whether to periodically check for new topics and partitions.

nested_params.name: StartingPosition
nested_params.description: Configuration for specifying the position in the topics to start replicating from.

nested_params.name: Type
nested_params.description: The type of replication starting position.

nested_params.name: TopicNameConfiguration
nested_params.description: Configuration for specifying replicated topic names should be the same as their corresponding upstream topics or prefixed with source cluster alias.

nested_params.name: Type
nested_params.description: The type of replicated topic name.

nested_params.name: TopicsToExclude
nested_params.description: List of regular expression patterns indicating the topics that should not be replicated.

nested_params.name: TopicsToReplicate
nested_params.description: List of regular expression patterns indicating the topics to copy.

parameters.name: ReplicatorName
parameters.description: The name of the replicator. Alpha-numeric characters with ---' are allowed.

parameters.name: ServiceExecutionRoleArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the IAM role used by the replicator to access resources in the customer's account (e.g source and target clusters)

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: List of tags to attach to created Replicator. (string) --- (string) ---
